be.signalsync.slicer

Class StreamSetSlicer

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.signalsync.slicer.Slicer<java.util.Map<StreamGroup,float[]>>
      • be.signalsync.slicer.StreamSetSlicer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SliceListener<float[]>

    public class StreamSetSlicer
extends Slicer<java.util.Map<StreamGroup,float[]>>
implements SliceListener<float[]>
    This class is a Slicer used to take slices of different streams wrapped in a StreamSet. Just the audiostreams from each StreamGroup will be sliced.
    Author:
    Ward Van Assche

      Creates a new StreamSetSlicer from a StreamSet.

      • StreamSetSlicer

        public StreamSetSlicer(StreamSet streamSet,
                       int sliceSize,
                       int sliceStep)
        Creates a new StreamSetSlicer from a StreamSet.
        Parameters:
        streamSet - The streamset to extract the slices from.
        time - The time in seconds of each slice.
        step - The step size between each slice in seconds.
